io.github.nkrusch.spacelaunchone.features.timers

Class TimerFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • io.github.nkrusch.spacelaunchone.features.timers.TimerFragment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DetailsTimer

    public class TimerFragment
extends Fragment
    This fragment shows a countdown timer to some event To start timer, provide launchTime as UTC time in the Fragment constructor. Parent of this fragment may also add listener to know when countdown finishes using registerOnFinishCallback(OnFinishCallback)
